#labels Phase-Implementation,SQL,wikt_parsed
How to extract some information from the database *wikt_parsed* of the parsed Wiktionary.

= wikt_parsed =

The number of entries and selected types of lexical semantic information available from the Russian edition of Wiktionary as of January 2009 (see [http://code.google.com/p/wikokit/downloads/detail?name=ruwikt20090122_parsed_with_translation.zip ruwikt20090122_parsed_with_translation]).

|| *Question* || *SQL* || *Result* || *Comment* || en || de || ru || uk ||
|| English language code || SELECT `*` FROM lang WHERE code="en"; || id = 85 || || 85 || 74 || 276 || 352 ||
|| Entries || SELECT COUNT(`*`) FROM lang_pos WHERE lang_id=85; || 2'813 || || 2813 || 13'072 || 124'301 || 88'575 ||
|| noun code || SELECT `*` FROM part_of_speech WHERE name="noun"; || 11 || || || || || ||
|| || noun=11; verb=21; adjective=3; unknown=20 || || || || || || ||
|| English nouns || SELECT COUNT(`*`) FROM lang_pos WHERE lang_id=85 AND pos_id=11; || 935 || || || || || ||
|| nouns || ||  || || 935 || 336 || 58843 || 40607 ||
|| verb || Parser is unfinished :) ||  || Too little verbs!? || 342 || 49 || 356 || 24'096 ||
|| adjective || ||  || || 184 || 18 || 2'168 || 23'536 ||
|| unknown || Part of speech don't recognized by the parser ||  || || 1'321 || 12'648 || 57'573 || 331 ||
